about_the_game:
Px2d Three Kingdoms Theme Role Expansion Package 001

Head assembly: 191
Shoulder assembly: 57
Foot assembly: 1
Weapon components: 163
Decorative components: 2
Effect components: 12
Body components: 201
Hand components: 10
Back assembly: 30
Armor components: 15
Auxiliary components: 2

Total number of components: 684

Usage: load dlc. The resource content will be automatically replaced after loading.

Important tips
Only one dlc content can be loaded automatically at a time.
It is not recommended to load multiple dlcs at the same time. Too much loading will cause memory overflow and software errors. Unable to use.
If you have to use the contents of multiple dlcs at the same time, there is also a way.
It is to create a new role folder, and then put the contents of multiple dlcs in it. The resource names should be rearranged in order in advance.
Then modify the resource quantity of each component in the px2d.INI file.
Finally, just overwrite the new role folder and the new px2d.INI file into the ontology folder.

Finally, just overwrite the new role folder and the new px2d.INI file into the ontology folder.
